Column.name: v.no of records in full range
v.no of recs in out form

ExpSyntax.val: ' and Product_ID = product_property_value.product_id and product_property_value.property_classification ='&Trim (Str ({0,6},'5'))&' and product_property_value.property_id = '&Trim (Str ({0,7},'5'))

'and Product_ID = product_property_value.product_id and product_property_value.property_classification ='&Trim (Str ({0,6},'5'))&' and product_property_value.property_id = '&Trim (Str ({0,7},'5'))&' and product_property_value.product_property_value='&ASCIIChr (39)&Trim ({0,8})&ASCIIChr (39)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from product where product_id in (select product_id from product_property_value where 1=1:1) :2
select distinct product_property_value from product_property_value where property_classification = :1 and property_id= :2
